sentences.sContent: The River Rhine rises in Switzerland.
But I did not need to go to Switzerland to learn that.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I did not need to go to Switzerland to learn that.
sentences.sCn: 到瑞士要是就为了知道这些就大可不必去了。

sentences.sContent: The banks needed to do something, so they turned themselves into the Switzerland of the Gulf.
sentences.sContent_eng: The banks needed to do something, so they turned themselves into the Switzerland of the Gulf.
sentences.sCn: 银行必须做点什么，于是它们把迪拜变成了波斯湾地区的瑞士。
